TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface to select and configure a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a user interface for choosing and configuring a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> from a list of available fonts.
## Examples The following code example uses an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor> with a property.
[!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#2)]

Docs.summary: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by .
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object that was passed to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
